description: Detects execution of renamed paexec via imphash and executable product string
name: Execution of Renamed PaExec
query: ((Product:*PAExec* AND (winlog.event_data.Imphash:("11D40A7B7876288F919AB819CC2D9802" OR "6444f8a34e99b8f7d9647de66aabe516" OR "dfd6aa3f7b2b1035b76b718f1ddc689f" OR "1a6cca4d5460b1710a12dea39e4a592c") OR winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*IMPHASH\=11D40A7B7876288F919AB819CC2D9802* OR *IMPHASH\=6444f8a34e99b8f7d9647de66aabe516* OR *IMPHASH\=dfd6aa3f7b2b1035b76b718f1ddc689f* OR *IMPHASH\=1a6cca4d5460b1710a12dea39e4a592c*))) AND (NOT (process.executable:*paexec*)))
author: Jason Lynch
